General.Name: MetaLabs Co Ltd
General.Description: Metalabs Co., Ltd. primarily provides clothing in South Korea. It also manufactures and distributes prescription drugs, medical devices, and masks; develops peptide-based bio products; offers medical management services; and distributes cosmetics, as well as operates dating applications. The company was formerly known as Avista Inc. and changed its name to Metalabs Co., Ltd. in April 2018. Metalabs Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
